Outside Appcation Docx

Welcome!This Docx will help you to create your own appcation for CMD System!

Now you gonna have some tools:

· Python IDLE(Your can use Python Codex)

If you are ready,then let's GO!

1.Create a new *.py file(Be sure,your file name is your project name!).

2.If you need to import some other files,use "import <Your import thing name>" at first.

3.Then the appcation need a main code(like c++ : int main()).

The code of 2 and 3

import ***

#This is the code of 3:

def start() :

#Your code

4.Put your code in <CMD System path>\_internal\app folder.

5.It's ready to test your code on CMD System!
